title: How many pencils are thrown away each year? - Quora

response.answer_text: Whole (intact) pencils? Probably not too many. Used pencils? Probably as many as are produced a year. Otherwise we’d have a stockpile of used pencils piling up over time. I’ve seen estimates that 2 billion pencils are used in the U.S. each year and that 14 billion pencils are produced in the world each year.
